name: Node.js Setup
description: Installs Node.js (Version Selectable), manages 'nvm' style switching via Scoop, and auto-fixes PATH variables.

name: Python Setup
description: Installs specific Python versions (e.g., 3.12, 3.9), handles parallel installations, and uninstalls cleanly.

name: Java JDK Setup
description: Installs JDKs (Temurin, OpenJDK) via Scoop. Supports Java 8, 17, 21 LTS versions with switch capability.

name: JAVA_HOME Tool
description: Scans for installed JDKs and allows you to set the system JAVA_HOME variable and update PATH interactively.

name: PHP Setup
description: Installs PHP versions (8.x, 7.x) via Scoop's versions bucket. Supports switching active versions.

name: Laravel Commands
description: Cheatsheet of common Laravel Artisan commands for development, migrations, and optimization.
